items.title: Israeli hospital hit by Iranian missile strike
items.description: Israel called the attack "criminal", while Iran said it had targeted a site nearby and not the hospital itself.

items.title: Hurricane Erick makes landfall in Mexico's Oaxaca state
items.description: The storm is expected to bring 'devastating winds' to the states of Oaxaca and Guerrero.

items.title: Armenia's PM accuses head of Church of fathering child in febrile political row
items.description: The spat threatens to split society, affect elections and harm peace with neighbouring Azerbaijan.

items.title: South Africa's firebrand MP banned from entering UK
items.description: Opposition MP Julius Malema is "non-conducive to the public good", the Home Office says.

items.title: Rwanda and DR Congo agree draft peace deal to end conflict
items.description: US Secretary of State Marco Rubio is expected to witness the formal signing of the peace deal next week.
